import './App.css'; import React, { Component } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; class Add extends Component{ state = { fname:'', lname:'', email:'', phone:'', gender:'', role:'', city:'', state:'', id_no:'', } handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); const user = { fname: this.state.fname, lname: this.state.lname }; axios.post(`http://localhost/PHPReact/add_user.php`, { user }) .then(res => { console.log(res); console.log(res.data); }) } render(){ return(
); } } export default Add;
